Articles.Content:
Hi I recently downloaded the Snacks! life support mod and I am having NRE's pop into my debug log and some buttons aren't working. Since I already have some Snacks on ships the game seems to crash when loading up without Snacks. I really want to play with Snacks but I can't figure out how to solve this problem. I have no idea what could be causing this since I don't know how to tell when somethings not working in the output_log. I do realize 64-bit has problems and stuff but it was working for me before.

Output_Log

If someone could point out some conflict of a mod in the output_log or tell me how to fix this bug that would be great!

EDIT: Buttons that don't work are stock toolbar ones that are mods.

Edited September 1, 2014 by tygoo7
Please follow the guidelines in the stickied thread.

Please follow the guidelines in the stickied thread.

Thanks Nathan, didn't see that. I will follow that for future reference. On the other hand I found what was causing it. Chatterer. I'm sure it's just a 64-bit problem with the mod though and not the mod itself.

Hi,

They are called NRE's instead of MRE's? I was in the military RL... Whats NRE? Noodles Ready to Eat ?!

Cmdr Zeta

tygoo7: I would hazard a guess that Chatterer is pushing you over-limit on stack or heap, or something.

CDR Zeta: Null Reference Exception (like Java's Null Pointer Exception).
